trans-unit.source: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that can cycle through a set of states and maintain a state once set.
trans-unit.target: Expõe métodos e propriedades para oferecer suporte ao acesso de cliente de automação de interface do usuário para controles que podem alternar entre um conjunto de estados e manter que um estado definido uma vez.

trans-unit.source: Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Implementado em um provedor de automação de interface do usuário que deve dar suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern>padrão de controle.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern>

trans-unit.source: Cycles through the toggle states of a control.
trans-unit.target: Alterna entre os estados de alternância de um controle.

trans-unit.source: A control must cycle through its toggle states in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, and (if supported) <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.
trans-unit.target: Um controle deve percorrer seus estados de alternância nesta ordem: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>e (se houver suporte) <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the toggle state of the control.

A control must cycle through its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, and (if supported) <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.
trans-unit.target: Um controle deve percorrer seu <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>nesta ordem: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>e (se houver suporte) <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>
